description:
It`s the second round of the Fated Clash, and for some reason, Mikoto`s opponent Taizo Kiyokura knows about Akina, and even visits Hikari in hospital. The fight begins, and while Taizo praises Mikoto`s effort, he also remarks that he "can`t see her self in her fights".
Source: crunchyroll

titles.title: Banka Terasu wa Shirube no Hoshi
